nodes.label: Software Engineering
nodes.description: The root level of software engineering knowledge categories for Alejandro Chang.

nodes.label: Core Development
nodes.description: Fundamental programming skills, principles, and paradigms.

nodes.label: Frontend Development
nodes.description: Skills and technologies for building user interfaces and client-side applications.

nodes.label: Backend Development
nodes.description: Server-side application development, API design, and backend frameworks.

nodes.label: Data Management
nodes.description: Database technologies (SQL & NoSQL), data processing, and storage solutions.

nodes.label: DevOps & Infrastructure
nodes.description: Cloud platforms, containerization, CI/CD, and infrastructure automation.

nodes.label: AI & Machine Learning
nodes.description: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, LLMs, RAG, and related technologies.

nodes.label: Security & Compliance
nodes.description: Application security, infrastructure security, and compliance practices.

nodes.label: Software Practices
nodes.description: Development methodologies, testing strategies, and software quality assurance.

nodes.label: Languages & Paradigms
nodes.description: Programming languages and fundamental coding approaches.

nodes.label: Software Principles & Patterns
nodes.description: Best practices, design principles (SOLID, Clean Code), and architectural patterns.

nodes.label: JavaScript/TypeScript
nodes.description: Core languages for web development, with TypeScript adding static typing.

nodes.label: Python
nodes.description: Versatile language for web development, AI/ML, and automation.

nodes.label: Java
nodes.description: Object-oriented language for enterprise applications.

nodes.label: Shell Scripting
nodes.description: Scripting for OS automation (Bash, Zsh).

nodes.label: OOP
nodes.description: Object-Oriented Programming principles.

nodes.label: Functional Programming
nodes.description: Paradigm emphasizing pure functions and immutability.

nodes.label: Event-Driven Architecture
nodes.description: Systems designed around production, detection, consumption of, and reaction to events.

nodes.label: SOLID & Clean Code
nodes.description: Principles for writing maintainable and robust software.

nodes.label: UI Technologies
nodes.description: Core web technologies for structure and styling (HTML, CSS, Sass).

nodes.label: Frontend Frameworks
nodes.description: Libraries and frameworks for building modern UIs (React, Angular, Next.js).

nodes.label: React Ecosystem
nodes.description: React, Redux, React Router, Next.js, Storybook.

nodes.label: Angular Ecosystem
nodes.description: Angular framework and related tools.

nodes.label: CSS Frameworks
nodes.description: Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS.

nodes.label: API Design & Dev
nodes.description: Designing and building APIs (REST, GraphQL, gRPC).

nodes.label: Backend Frameworks
nodes.description: Server-side frameworks (Spring Boot, Node.js/Express, FastAPI).

nodes.label: Spring Boot (Java)
nodes.description: Framework for Java-based microservices and web applications.

nodes.label: Node.js/Express
nodes.description: JavaScript runtime and framework for backend services.

nodes.label: FastAPI (Python)
nodes.description: Modern Python framework for building APIs.

nodes.label: Messaging & Streaming
nodes.description: Technologies for asynchronous communication (Kafka, SQS/SNS, Solace).

nodes.label: SQL Databases
nodes.description: Relational databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle, SQL Server).

nodes.label: NoSQL Databases
nodes.description: Non-relational databases (MongoDB, Redis, DynamoDB, Cassandra, Elasticsearch).

nodes.label: Vector Databases
nodes.description: Databases for vector embeddings (Pinecone).

nodes.label: AWS Cloud Platform
nodes.description: Amazon Web Services (EC2, S3, Lambda, EKS, SQS, SNS).

nodes.label: Containers & Orchestration
nodes.description: Docker and Kubernetes.

nodes.label: CI/CD & Automation
nodes.description: Continuous Integration/Deployment (Jenkins, GitHub Actions, ArgoCD).

nodes.label: Infrastructure as Code
nodes.description: Managing infrastructure with code (Terraform).

nodes.label: Monitoring & Observability
nodes.description: Tools for system monitoring (Splunk, Gatling).

nodes.label: RAG & LLMs
nodes.description: Retrieval-Augmented Generation and Large Language Models (OpenAI API).

nodes.label: AI Frameworks & Tools
nodes.description: Frameworks for AI/ML development (LangChain).

nodes.label: Prompt Engineering
nodes.description: Designing effective prompts for LLMs.

nodes.label: Application Security
nodes.description: Secure coding practices and vulnerability management (Snyk).
